post.description:
Submit a job post for admin approval.
Only the job owner (employer) can submit their job for approval.

Pause an active job post.
Only the job owner or admin can pause a job.

Resume a paused job post.
Only the job owner or admin can resume a job.

Close an active or paused job post.
Only the job owner or admin can close a job.

Cancel a job post (terminal action).
Only the job owner or admin can cancel a job.

Approve a job post.
Only admins can approve jobs.

Reject a job post.
Only admins can reject jobs.

Publish an approved job post.
Only admins can publish jobs.

Unpublish an active job post.
Only admins can unpublish jobs.

Flag a job post for review.
Only admins can flag jobs.

Remove flag from a job post.
Only admins can unflag jobs.

get.description:
Get jobs pending approval.

post.description:
Upload and validate a CSV file for job import.

Args:
    file: CSV file containing job data
    config: Optional JSON string with import configuration
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    CSVUploadResponse with validation results and upload ID

get.description:
Get the status of a CSV import operation.

Args:
    upload_id: Unique identifier for the upload
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    CSVImportStatus with current progress and results

Get history of CSV import operations.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of records to return
    offset: Number of records to skip
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    List of import history records

delete.description:
Cancel an ongoing CSV import operation.

Args:
    upload_id: Unique identifier for the upload
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    Success message

get.description:
Download a CSV template with required fields for job import.

Args:
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    CSV template file

post.description:
Validate CSV data without importing.

Args:
    file: CSV file to validate
    config: Optional JSON string with validation configuration
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    Validation results with detailed error information

Upload and process a CSV file containing job board configurations.

Args:
    file: CSV file containing job board data (name, url, search_url, etc.)
    test_accessibility: Whether to test website accessibility during import
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    JobBoardCSVUploadResponse with processing results and upload ID

get.description:
Get the status of a job board CSV import operation.

Args:
    upload_id: Unique identifier for the upload
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    Import status with progress and results

Download a CSV template for job board configurations.

Args:
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    CSV template file with sample job board data

post.description:
Validate job board CSV data without importing.

Args:

    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    Validation results with detailed error information
Run all active job board configurations from CSV imports

schema.title: Response Run Job Board Scrapers Api V1 Admin Csv Job Boards Run Post

get.description:

    include_sample: Whether to include sample data
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    CSV template file

post.description:
Upload and validate a CSV file for memory import.

Args:
    file: CSV file containing memory data
    memory_type: Type of memory data (website_patterns, scraping_rules, content_templates)
    config: Optional JSON string with import configuration
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    MemoryUploadResponse with validation results and upload ID

get.description:
Get the status of a memory upload operation.

Args:
    upload_id: Unique identifier for the upload
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    MemoryUploadStatus with current progress and results

Get history of memory upload operations.

Args:
    memory_type: Optional filter by memory type
    limit: Maximum number of records to return
    offset: Number of records to skip
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    List of memory upload history records

delete.description:
Cancel an ongoing memory upload operation.

Args:
    upload_id: Unique identifier for the upload
    db: Database session
    current_user: Authenticated admin user

Returns:
    Success message

post.description:

post.description:
Upload websites in bulk via CSV file.

Args:
    file: CSV file containing website configurations
    enable_validation: Enable URL validation
    auto_categorize: Auto-categorize websites using ML
    default_rate_limit: Default rate limit for websites
    default_max_pages: Default max pages for websites

Returns:
    Upload response with status and progress information

get.description:
Get the status of a website upload.

Args:
    upload_id: Upload ID to check status for

Returns:
    Upload status with progress information

Get upload history for the current user.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of records to return
    offset: Number of records to skip

Returns:
    List of upload history records

    upload_id: Upload ID to cancel

Returns:

Update a managed website configuration.

    website_config: Updated website configuration

    Updated website information

delete.description:
Delete a managed website.

Args:

Returns:
    Deletion confirmation
